component.name: RunManager

item.itemvalue: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor
Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor & Play

task.summary:
Updated feedback system building notifications and coloring
When you hover over structures you can build, you get different color highlights which show whether you can or cant build it because you dont have x amount of type resources. You also get a short feedback notification when you build and lose resources because of that.
New waves pop-up added and improved score updating in-game.
Finished the main menu and added all menu buttons

MESSAGE.value:
Updated feedback system building notifications and coloring
When you hover over structures you can build, you get different color highlights which show whether you can or cant build it because you dont have x amount of type resources. You also get a short feedback notification when you build and lose resources because of that.
New waves pop-up added and improved score updating in-game.
Finished the main menu and added all menu buttons
